Uses of Class
de.hshl.obj.loader.objects.Surface

  • Packages that use Surface 
    Package Description
    de.hshl.obj.loader
    Provides a simple API for the core functionality of this library.
    de.hshl.obj.loader.objects
    Classes which are used to represent the OBJ file after loading.

    • Uses of Surface in de.hshl.obj.loader

      Methods in de.hshl.obj.loader that return types with arguments of type Surface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Surface> OBJLoader.loadSurfaces(Resource resource)
      Load all geometry with materials from the OBJ file into a list of Surfaces.

    • Uses of Surface in de.hshl.obj.loader.objects

      Methods in de.hshl.obj.loader.objects that return types with arguments of type Surface 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<Surface> Surface.extract(TriangularOBJBuilder obj, boolean indexing)
      For each section with a material inside the TriangularOBJBuilder, extract a Surface with that material.
      java.util.List<Surface> SurfaceObject.getSurfaces()
      The OBJ data is split to create a separate Surface for each material in this object.
      Constructor parameters in de.hshl.obj.loader.objects with type arguments of type Surface 
      Constructor and Description
